rows.label: qst701007_msg0001
rows.name: That should do it. I'll get to work.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0002
rows.name: Starting work, are you?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0003
rows.name:
This might cause a fair bit of
disruption to your business, Fred.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't worry about that, Zain.
You're doing us all a big favor.
Just concentrate on your work.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0005
rows.name:
I'll hang a sign to let people know
we'll be closed for a little while.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0006
rows.name: That works. Cheers.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0007
rows.name: I can lend a hand too, Dad.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0008
rows.name: Opens, closes. It'll do right enough.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0009
rows.name: Woo hoo! Way to go, Dad!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0010
rows.name: So this is our shelter.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0011
rows.name:
This incredible! Dooriest door Morumo
ever see! Cannot imagine it break ever!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0012
rows.name:
Would you like to test that? Feel free
to give it a good old whack!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0013
rows.name:
That OK...?
How hard should Morumo hit it?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0014
rows.name: Whoa, stop stop stop! It's not a toy!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0015
rows.name: Feeling tired Laura?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0016
rows.name:
Yeah, no...
I'm just having a bit of a moment.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0017
rows.name:
It feels like there's been more downs
than ups lately. I was starting to think
that there's no hope for us after all.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0018
rows.name:
But...look. Sometimes hope's not
misplaced after all. All you have to
do is keep it burning.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0019
rows.name:
Iirans are a hardy folk. They don't
give up when it's dark. Sometimes
they're all the stronger for it.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0020
rows.name:
So don't go feeling like the world's
resting on your shoulders alone. We're
here too, and we're more than capable.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0021
rows.name:
We not just defenseless little pups!
We show spirit, we rally together,
and make difference!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0022
rows.name:
This shelter will take a weight off of
our minds. Now we can fight without
the fear of the worst-case scenario.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0023
rows.name:
Excuse me. Sorry to interrupt, but
Zain would like to discuss the
building of the next shelter.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0024
rows.name:
Already? We only just got done
with this one.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0025
rows.name:
No time like present! Gathering of funds
is also issue.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0026
rows.name: There's so much to do!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0027
rows.name: Shin, Kasumi. Got a moment?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0028
rows.name: What's the matter?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0029
rows.name:
So, this is just an idea, OK? I don't
know if we'd be able to do it, but...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0030
rows.name:
When the war is over, why don't
we build a house? Together.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0031
rows.name: A...house?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0032
rows.name:
I want to help people the way you've
helped me. I've been mulling it over,
but I just couldn't think of anything.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0033
rows.name:
Then I had a brainwave: it might be
nice to build a house. For war orphans.
Somewhere that they can call home.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0034
rows.name: Maybe I'm just being silly.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0035
rows.name: I think that's wonderful, my lady!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0036
rows.name:
Indeed. That's a lot of people to take
care of, though. It could get expensive.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0037
rows.name:
You're right. First we'd need money
to build the house, then we'd have to
find some way to support us all...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0038
rows.name:
But even if it doesn't work out,
having something to strive for
might help you keep your spirits up.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0039
rows.name:
I think so too! Wouldn't it be nice
to have a big family at last Laura-sama?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0040
rows.name:
A big family...
When you put it like that, I'm kind of
impatient to make it happen now!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0041
rows.name:
Thanks, guys. I was convinced you
were going to laugh at me.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0042
rows.name:
We would never laugh at your
dreams, Lora.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0043
rows.name:
When all this is over, why don't we
talk to Adel about it? He'd help
us out for sure.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0044
rows.name: Yeah, I plan to.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0045
rows.name:
So let's do our utmost to protect
Iira and make it happen!
